name: csc847-project3
description: React Node Template is a simple, unopinionated, full stack web app template, with the goal of facilitating quick prototyping and deployment to [Heroku](https://www.heroku.com/) or elsewhere.

scripts.start: cd src/server && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd src/server && nodemon" "cd src/client && npm start"
scripts.build: cd src/client && npm install && npm run build

author: Benjamin Kao, Elliot Kang, Hirva Patel, Khushboo Gandhi, Nidhi Jyani
